game.name: Cocktail Rush
game.shortDescription: Cocktail Rush is a match 3 game with visual novel elements and nice hand-drawn graphics. You need to help the cute bar workers with the work at the bar by connecting the same drinks into groups.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Cocktail Rush is a match 3 game with visual novel elements and nice hand-drawn graphics. You need to help the cute bar workers with the work at the bar by connecting the same drinks into groups.
